residency.title: Certificate of Residency
residency.body: This is to certify that {{residentName}}, of {{address}}, is a bona fide resident of this municipality.
residency.footer: This document is issued upon request for {{purpose}}.

certificate_of_residency.title: Certificate of Residency
certificate_of_residency.body: This is to certify that {{residentName}}, of {{address}}, is a bona fide resident of this municipality.
certificate_of_residency.footer: This document is issued upon request for {{purpose}}.

indigency.title: Certificate of Indigency
indigency.body: This certifies that {{residentName}} of {{address}} is among the indigent residents of this municipality and is in need of assistance.

certificate_of_indigency.title: Certificate of Indigency
certificate_of_indigency.body: This certifies that {{residentName}} of {{address}} is among the indigent residents of this municipality and is in need of assistance.

clearance.title: Barangay Clearance
clearance.body: This is to certify that {{residentName}}, residing at {{address}}, has no pending violations or cases in this barangay.

barangay_clearance.title: Barangay Clearance
barangay_clearance.body: This is to certify that {{residentName}}, residing at {{address}}, has no pending violations or cases in this barangay.

brgy_clearance.title: Barangay Clearance
brgy_clearance.body: This is to certify that {{residentName}}, residing at {{address}}, has no pending violations or cases in this barangay.

brgy_residency.title: Certificate of Residency
brgy_residency.body: This is to certify that {{residentName}}, of {{address}}, is a bona fide resident of this barangay and municipality.
brgy_residency.footer: This document is issued upon request for {{purpose}}.

brgy_indigency.title: Certificate of Indigency
brgy_indigency.body: This certifies that {{residentName}} of {{address}} is among the indigent residents of this barangay and is in need of assistance.

brgy_good_moral.title: Certificate of Good Moral Character
brgy_good_moral.body: This is to certify that {{residentName}}, a resident of {{address}}, is known to be of good moral character and has exhibited proper conduct within this barangay.

brgy_no_case.title: Certificate of No Barangay Case
brgy_no_case.body: This certifies that {{residentName}} has no pending barangay case recorded against them in this barangay as of {{date}}.

business_permit.title: Business Clearance
business_permit.body: This certifies that the business {{businessName}}, owned by {{residentName}}, located at {{address}}, is registered and permitted to operate within this municipality.

generic.title: Certification
generic.footer: Issued this {{date}} at the Municipality of {{municipality}}.
